  • Constructor Details

    • LoginSuccessfulEvent

      public LoginSuccessfulEvent(Object source, @Nullable @Nullable String host, Locale locale)
      Event triggered when a successful login takes place.
      Parameters:
      source - the Authentication of the person logging in.
      host - The hostname from the request if available
      locale - The locale of the request
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if source is null.
      Since:
      4.7.0
